name: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16 – Licensed to Drive Remastered
name_original: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16 – Licensed to Drive Remastered
description:
Join Mary-Kate and Ashely as they get their driver's licenses on their Sweet 16!
This Remaster has exclusive gameplay segments not seen in the original version of the game!

Play now and join in the adventure of a lifetime!
